keynoteSpeakers.name: Mr. Rishikesan Visuvamithran
keynoteSpeakers.title: Enthusiastic Engineer
keynoteSpeakers.affiliation: Renault Nissan Technology and Business Center, India
keynoteSpeakers.bio: Mr. Visuvamithran is a leading expert in automotive AI, focusing on developing sustainable and efficient transportation systems. His work is pivotal in shaping the future of autonomous driving and smart vehicle technology.

keynoteSpeakers.name: Dr. Alankrita Singh
keynoteSpeakers.title: Assistant Professor
keynoteSpeakers.affiliation: Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee, India
keynoteSpeakers.bio: Dr. Singh's research lies at the intersection of machine learning and climate science. She develops advanced models to predict environmental changes and inform policies for sustainable development and disaster mitigation.

keynoteSpeakers.name: Dr. Geethapriyan Thangamani
keynoteSpeakers.title: Researcher
keynoteSpeakers.bio: Specializing in AI for renewable energy systems, Dr. Thangamani's work contributes to creating more resilient and efficient smart grids. His research is key to integrating sustainable energy sources globally.
